name: RGB TowerDefense
description:
Randy dances and blinks in Random Colors.

Shoot the respective RGB values of the Enemies down, so they can´t take the Colors and Joy from Randy!

-StartScreen with Placeholder UI

          -Klick Randy to show UI

          -Red and Green Button Load Level0

          -Blue Button Quits Game

-Level0  (Takes your hand real tight) 

          -More Building Slots & Towers unlock during play

         -Klick Randy to get back to StartScreen
